website_summaries.verdict: Complete set that personal trainers swear by.
pros: 9-piece set includes 5 bands,  door anchor, ankle strap, exercise chart and carrying case
Clipping mechanism means you can use more than one band at a time, providing up to 30 pounds of resistance
Door anchor means you can perform more exercises than regular bands offer
Instructions clearly explain how to attach to door and use bands
cons: You must inspect bands and clips regularly to make sure there's no wear and tear

customer_reviews.title: Stitching failed causing injury
customer_reviews.text: Strictly the facts. The product was used 6 times over a five month period. The stitching failed as shown in the picture causing the metal ring to slingshot into my face. Deep laceration on the cheek bone, bruised eye ball and eye lid. Required immediate attention from emergency room doctor with dermabond, medication, and eye examination. It could have been much worse. I wouldn’t recommend using this product without the use of a helmet.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Stephen Batson

customer_reviews.title: these bands easily rip and tear after a few months of use
customer_reviews.text: These are all based on a simple idea of using the elasticity of bands to provide resistance for a workout. They only needed to do one thing to improve this basic idea so that it could be safe to use at home. The resilience of the elastic bands. However, these are just off the shelf bands with no improvement. As a result, these bands easily rip and tear after a few months of use. The lifetime product warranty that they are talking about covers only the first 90 days of use because that's how they define the product lifetime in the fine print. That's the product you will be paying $30 for. Beware.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: CAUTION!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm conflicted over this review, as I loved this product until this morning when I ended up at the hospital getting stitches in the back of my head after the Velcro strap ripped off, sending the d-ring and carabiner flying into my head at 100Mph. Great bands, just be very careful using the Velcro strap.
customer_reviews.author: Jm

customer_reviews.title: terrifying how these bands randomly snap!
customer_reviews.text: I used the yellow band for the first time ever four days ago. (it's a very light band and I've never had any use for it) I wound it around my hands, pulled it lightly and it went flying across the room. I am SO lucky I did not get hurt! I immediately emailed the manufacturer to aske them to replace the faulty yellow band and have not heard one peep. so they clearly don't give a sh*t about their inferior products. Next I came to Amazon, where I bought them originally, and I read all these horrible reviews of people getting hurt using these bands! The rest are going in the garbage!
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: The bands are of moderate quality but the thing that ...
customer_reviews.text: The bands are of moderate quality but the thing that put me off from this product is that they have a "free orange band promotion." The leaflet in the bag says "call this number and we'll send you a free orange (35-40# resist) band" but once on the phone they say "that offer is only if you leave a review online." Nowhere does it mention it on the flyer that you'd be expected to write a review for them and I feel the tactic is a bit gross and certainly makes the high reviews you may see for this product to be questionable.
customer_reviews.author: keith

customer_reviews.title: Huge risk using this cheap equipment
customer_reviews.text: Been excercising consistently for over ten years and recently decided to get out of the gym and workout at home more often. The metal ring attached to ankle strap broke under tension. It sling shot itself into my chin leaving a cut that lasted for nearly a month. Its a miracle I wasn't blinded in one eye. A slightly different trajectory would have changed my life forever. If you want to risk being maimed, join the military. They will at least take care of you and pay for a nice looking glass eye. Returned the set and will never use bands again.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: the blue and green are expected to fail but the black and red bands are in good shape (higher-weighted resistance less likely to
customer_reviews.text: Buyer Beware - No Lifetime Warranty Black Mountain Products Fail At Customer Service Purchased Bands for frequent outdoor use and already the yellow band has snapped; the blue and green are expected to fail but the black and red bands are in good shape (higher-weighted resistance less likely to snap) Tried contacting BMP to replace 3x bands but to no avail. No Response from Amazon or BMP 1 star
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable at all
customer_reviews.text: These bands broke for me within 3 weeks. I was using them every day as part of physical therapy. I was not stressing them a lot as I am still working on my muscle strength. Unfortunately the stitching completely broke apart and the metal ring snapped back while in use. Thankfully I was not injured but it could have been much worse. I do not recommend this product at all and suggest you spend a bit more for higher quality bands
customer_reviews.author: Dove Family

customer_reviews.title: NOT SAFE, DO NOT USE
customer_reviews.text: Rubber in resistance bands breaks down eventually, and they snap. It's inevitable. To prevent people getting hurt, modern resistance bands have a string threaded through them. This way, when the band snaps, it is contained and doesn't take out your eye when it snaps. THESE RESISTANCE BANDS DO NOT HAVE THE INTERNAL STRING. THEY ARE DANGEROUS. I'm returning them right away.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: CAN BE A LAW SUIT terrible
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT USE THIS NOR BUY IT. i purchased it 2 years ago and used it for 1 month before it snapped right into the back of my neck. I just saw today this product is still being sold DO NOT BUY IT it can and will kill you.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Red band  defective
customer_reviews.text: I used the red band today and I barely tugged on it and it came apart. Looks like the little bump under the black band is not there so when I pulled it slip right through. I don’t see any way to contact the seller to see if I can replace just the red band so I guess I’m going to send everything back. 😕
customer_reviews.author: aes

customer_reviews.title: Poor stitching - snapped day 1
customer_reviews.text: The stitching snapped on first use and threw cables and clips into my back, breaking the skin and leaving large painful welts. First day of vacation at a beach.
customer_reviews.author: James K.

customer_reviews.title: 90 days???
customer_reviews.text: That's crazy! I forgot the weight equivalent of these bands and I came to the site to see if I could look them up when I saw that these are not to be used after 90 days!!!??!! Really??? I'm so glad they didn't break on me like they did with the guy who had the attachments lacerate his eye which required an immediate visit to the emergency hospital! Had I known the 90 days thing, I would have NEVER BOUGHT THESE BANDS! That needs to be the first thing a potential buyer sees!!!!
customer_reviews.author: GC

customer_reviews.title: Issues
customer_reviews.text: My product arrived with an issue with the clasp for one of the straps. I contacted the manufacturer, and they said they would send a new one, but it hasn't arrived. The guide within was very poorly put together, appeared careless. I also found the "90 days of use" concerning with regards to it also being a "lifetime warranty" I am open to adjusting my feedback if the manufacturer would address these issues.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty K

customer_reviews.title: Higher quality than expected
customer_reviews.text: So we got this in the mail today...me and my girlfriend have each had one of these over the years but different brands. We were shocked at how high quality this was when we opened it. Seriously, it's heavy duty. Glad we got it.
customer_reviews.author: John III

customer_reviews.title: easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: I got these to be able to perform a full-body workout without having to get a full dumbbell set or one of those expensive adjustable dumbbell sets. These really work well for that use. These are definitely the most well-made exercise bands I've ever used. Usually when using exercise bands, I have this fear that the thing will break and smack me in the face. Not with these! They have big grommets and carabiners holding them together. Also, the door anchor is well designed, easy to setup, and won't cause any damage to door frames. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: vkm2000

customer_reviews.title: works fine for me
customer_reviews.text: i know some people have been writing about how the bands have snapped on them but if you use them a little conservatively, they shouldn't show any signs of tearing. i'm sure if you stretch them to their maximum recommended length, like 300%, then yeah they're probably going to break. it's a $20 product for chrissake. i've been using them to about say 150% or 200% and they're totally fine. also, don't step on them with your shoes. that has to give some wear. use a little common sense. they're not made of iron. i think these bands are awesome. and they've definitely transformed my workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: This product is Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I have just recovered from my second shoulder surgery, so both shoulders are repaired. I needed to work out, but weights were out of the question. My wife purchased the basic resistance band package from black mountain products for my Christmas present and that has ended up being my favorite present of all. This product has helped me with my recovery and strengthening my whole body, so that I can function normally with everyday activities. A Big Thanks to BMC for creating this product, so I can get back to enjoying life and not just living. I would definitely recommend this product to all my friends and relatives. Thanks again for making a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn W. Coggins

customer_reviews.title: An injury waiting to happen.
customer_reviews.text: I'm writing this review after reading the others describe how their bands broke causing injury. I've had these bands for years but didn't use them very often. Started using them since gyms were shutdown due to COVID-19. I've always thought about how bad it would be if the anchor broke since owning them. Sure enough the anchor seams tore causing the bands to it hit my back at full force. Thank God it wasn't my head or neck. Anyway, this thing is an injury waiting to happen.
customer_reviews.author: Leroy B.

customer_reviews.title: Quality looks excellent.
customer_reviews.text: I got an strap and a door strap accessory with my order. I love the advantages of having them. With the multiple bands I can progress further as my issues improve. I was in physical therapy for a neck issue last year and now for a strength issue with my right hip. I think my neck and hip issues go back to the time I was hit by a car at the age of 10 in 1956. These will be of great benefit for my issues and the convenience of continuing my exercises at home and keeping my muscles fine tuned and strong.
customer_reviews.author: CVS

customer_reviews.title: Buy this product if you workout from home.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of this product. I gave my first set to my son. If your gym is closed and you need some good resistance workouts you will not be disappointed. Here's the thing I like the best about this product. Each resistance band has it's own clips on the end so going from one band to another is a quick transition. You don't have to take the time to reattach the clips from one band to another in order to use them. Very good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Bob Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Great bands and warranty support!
customer_reviews.text: These bands are great. I have been using them for over a year now for moderate workouts in place of free weights and they have done a great job. I had seen some users complaining about Black Mountain's warranty claims, but I have not run into any issues with the Lifetime Warranty. I have reached out to the warranty department at Black Mountain twice now and they are quick with their responses and with shipping out replacements. With the nature of the bands, they will likely wear out eventually, but it's good to know Black Mountain has your back with warranty claims. Couldn't recommend more.
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality resulting in safety issues
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these a few years ago and have had several quality issues. The anchor broke within 6 months. Unfortunately the band snapped back and hit me in the chest knocking the wind out of me. Would not rely on the anchor for safety reasons. Since then my black and red bands have snapped apart. I only use these occasionally while traveling. They are convenient for this purpose since they don't take much space and are very personal allowing for a full body workout. Definitely would not recommended just because of the safety issues resulting from poor quality materials.
customer_reviews.author: Coopergrl

customer_reviews.title: Update:  Please don't use these
customer_reviews.text: I have not used these a great deal, perhaps 15 times in the past 3 months. This morning one of the bands snapped in half while I was using it. Fortunately, it did not come up and hit me in the face, and I was not injured. If I was, a court suit would surely have followed. My advice to anyone considering purchasing these is, don.t! They are a piece of crap and obviously poorly constructed. Stay away!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Russell

customer_reviews.title: They stand behind their warranty
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought these several years ago to use at home and when traveling, but ended up not using them much because I moved somewhere that had a small community fitness center. Dug them up during the pandemic and after some uses, the bands snapped, probably due to the age of the rubber. I emailed the Black Mountain not expecting much, but I was pleasantly surprised! Immediately offered a replacement and although shipping was a bit slow due to the pandemic, I received them and now can get back to my dad bod. Knocked off one star for durability due to the rubber snapping, but with the lifetime warranty you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: vlotty

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for in-home resistance training and toning!
customer_reviews.text: Great for in-home workouts for general resistance training in-lieu of keeping larger weights around to accomplish similar toning and extremely helpful for aspects of physical therapy! Well made and stow easily away when not using. Perfect for getting workouts in at home without taking up too much real estate! Quite versatile in how they can be used and come with a ton of great tips on different techniques. Incredible price point, making for a great addition to your spread of home exercise equipment (particularly when cramped on space)!
customer_reviews.author: NPchicago

customer_reviews.title: Band Clip broke after a few months
customer_reviews.text: Have had for a few months and the clip holding the band bent in causing the band to whip down and hit me. I only use this maybe once or twice a week so there was very little wear and tear. The band itself is still in great shape, but its hard to feel safe using the other bands after having this happen.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: MISSING PARTS
customer_reviews.text: UPDATED, very belatedly on my part, not theirs: they did send me the replacement parts! And overall these work great! This was missing several key parts, so I haven't been able to use them. The ankle strap and door insert, plus the book explaining how to use them, are all missing. I will be returning if the manufacturer does not send me the missing parts (if they do, I will amend my review).
customer_reviews.author: Eileen T. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: They tear after a year
customer_reviews.text: The cords tore after a year, and I'm not such a strong person. What can I say.... Careful, when they do it can be painful! I'm not sure other products at same price point are better - if you gotta buy this brand, just change for a new one every few months.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hermelin

customer_reviews.title: Used for 4 Months
customer_reviews.text: I've moved through 4 bands on my way to rehabbing a mild rotator cuff tear. I wish I would have picked these up before I got the weight bench and trained up minor stabilizing muscles. Notably helping me to improve my injury with the oversight of a physical therapist (I went for about 2 weeks and have subsequently continued their exercises at home for months). There's a wide variety of movements you can do with these, door anchor works fine, it's nice controlled resistance so you can go through a full range of motion slowly without risking anything.
customer_reviews.author: Sallyslim77

customer_reviews.title: You have good odds on these.
customer_reviews.text: Reading all the one star reviews and getting hurt surprised me. I’ve bought a few of these, same brand, and a few snapped...like a few years later. They should tell the distance to extend the band. My recommendation is to buy a second set and attach to combine the ideal weight to be mindful of your band extension. It will definitely reduce wear and possible injury when the band gets too old. Honestly, they are the best bands I’ve ever bought. Yes, the warranty is ridiculous, but they have exceeded expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Coakmgr

customer_reviews.title: It's everything it claims to be
customer_reviews.text: I like that it's everything it claims to be what I don't like is that NO bands arrange exercises by position of the band. Moving it back and forth is ANNOYING when I am working out I like to do it and get it done with no fuss at all. Just did three miles on the treadmill. I like it because all you have to do is get on and walk. I like the cords because they give me strength training and I haven't broken them. I have broken countless exercise bans. Drives me crazy to spend money on something that doesn't last.
customer_reviews.author: L. Cline

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I love how very easy they are to use and how durable they have been. I bought them 6 months ago and they still don’t even look a bit worn.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: I originally like these a lot but one of the handles just ...
customer_reviews.text: I originally like these a lot but one of the handles just cracked through normal moderate use. I would I will update the order depending how this is resolved, but for the price compared to similar products this is pretty disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Adam P

customer_reviews.title: Durable resistance bands
customer_reviews.text: My friend has been using these resistance bands for 2 years. They are very durable. None of the bands have broken since the first use. It is a good workout.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great for travelling!
customer_reviews.text: If you are somewhere with a door, you are all set. I am a bigger guy (6', 265 lbs.), so I need more weight. You can order extra bands separately up to 75 lbs. You can work every muscle group with these. They are great if you are going on a trip, especially if they don't have a branch of your gym where you'll be staying. I use to carry a bunch of free weights and bars up north with me. I don't need to do that, anymore. There is a chart showing various exercises for different muscle groups. I added a few, and I have a complete workout with them. I should have had these a long time ago!
customer_reviews.author: mark boudrias

customer_reviews.title: "Lifetime Warranty"
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing to learn after one of my bands broke that "lifetime" means 90 days
customer_reviews.author: MikeJ

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably well-made, good for my use.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace another set of bands that did not provide enough resistance. They arrived quickly (thanks Amazon) and I got them out and checked them out. They seem better than my old set and offer a greater range of resistance as well. I use these from the floor (foot capture) and from a wall-mounted anchor. They seem well made and are good enough to supplement my other resistance-training tools. After a few weeks of use, I can recommend these. I will continue to use them and will update my review if my experience changes.
customer_reviews.author: David B. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: These seem like they will last a while and are easy to use. The door attachment is secure and I like the metal hardware. I had some older plastic ones (different company) was was concerned they’d hit me in the head some day. These are strong and secure. It comes with information including tension for each band - I wrote this down on a card so it was easier to access as a quick reference for myself. I’m an aerialist and use these to help condition my pull up, lats, and work on that foot point! Must have for me!
customer_reviews.author: Jen S

customer_reviews.title: Short bands and short on refund
customer_reviews.text: Returned these because the bands were so tight they didn't allow for a full stretch and didn't like the fabric strap that had to be used to hook to the door. Plus they charged close to $8 to return it.
customer_reviews.author: James H. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use in so many ways
customer_reviews.text: I have had these a bit over 2 years, use them a couple times a week. Started with the same exercises that I learned in a Pulmonary Therapy class. Have branched out since then and find these very convenient at home and especially on road trips. So easy to use a hotel bathroom door for an anchor and get some kinks out after a long day driving. Perhaps I don't beat them up so much but they have lasted well over 90 days.
customer_reviews.author: Bobalicious

customer_reviews.title: Buy them.. they are great!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Love the flexible options. Black Mountain speared no expense here, these are made with quality components. I used a silver sharpie and numbered my bands from 1 to 5 on each side/end to help me understand the resistance from easy to hard. There is a chart included but its not convent to pull it out and figure it each time. Would be great if they were labeled better. Colored bands does not tell me how much resistance each is. The silver sharpie was an easy fix, otherwise I really enjoy using these.
customer_reviews.author: James Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Very well made band set at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of all of the bands is excellent right down to the connectors and handles. No frays, tight connectors. Different resistances allow me to bring a couple of bands on a trip and exercise in the hotel room with the included door attachment and the leg attachment. The only addition I would suggest would be to include the sleeve for standing exercises in the basic kit and increase the price point accordingly. Included bag is great for transport and organization. Well done!
customer_reviews.author: LeftWing

customer_reviews.title: Weights not marked. Inferior to other kits sold on Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: Inferior to other kits sold on Amazon. Cheaply made. The manufacturer skimoed and didn't mark the weight resistance levels on each band. You'll have to keep referring to the pamphlet to know which bands are which. Other manufacturers have clearly marked weights on the bands. Go with those!
customer_reviews.author: Jen L.

customer_reviews.title: I've been using mine everyday since I got them last ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using mine everyday since I got them last week...I've almost exclusively been using the red band but that just snapped on me. Not sure what the issue is. Other customers say they've been using theirs for MUCH longer. Maybe I just got a defective band? EDIT: I got in contact with Black Mountain and they graciously sent me a replacement band. Unfortunately they sent me the wrong (sent me another black one instead of a red one). Anyways, the thought was definitely there -- good customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Yu

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and effective exercise equipment
customer_reviews.text: Have used several sets over the past five years - extensive use and have had only one band break. That was probably due to my bad setup which abraded the band. With the nice spectrum of strengths it is pretty easy to adjust the resistance one is looking for. Of course, storage vs weights or other equipment is a huge plus. With a little creativity you can setup your own mini-gym. Another advantage is there is no shock to the joints like there can be weight free weights. You control the gradual, safe application of resistance.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey K.

customer_reviews.title: Upgrade from previous versions
customer_reviews.text: I bought these same bands years ago and have used them pretty consistently in my garage gym ever since. Recently my wife wanted to start stealing mine, so I bought a second set. They made a few improvements to the handle construction as well as the carabiners that hold the bands to the handles. I've never had a band snap or break, so not sure what others are doing with them. I would recommend and buy again
customer_reviews.author: Clayton

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre Resistance Tubes
customer_reviews.text: I've owned these bands for 5 years and periodically used them to perform resistance training engaging mainly upper body musculature. Each time pieces of the rubber would tear and today the handles unfortunately snapped. As a certified personal trainer if you're seeking durable and strong long-lasting bands I would consider other brands. Disappointed in the quality and will contact the manufacturer for a full refund or replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Asher

customer_reviews.title: Missing Ankle Strap
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing durable bands. I purchased mine in Nov. 2017, but basically put the box under my bed until June 2019. At that time I noticed that the kit did not include an Ankle Strap as shown. I tried to contact the company by email and phone and they did not respond. That was dissapointing as they have a great reputation and I expected to hear from them. I totally reccommend them, just check your box for all your parts and take care of it quick if it is missing something!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Weller

customer_reviews.title: Great For Lifting on The Road
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from degenerative disc disease and spinal stenosis, among other back problems. I've always worked out and kept in shape. Since my back condition has worsened, my dr recommend that I stop lifting heavy weights and try using different exercise bands. I've been using these BMP resistance bands for several weeks. I absolutely love them. They are very convenient to use, especially if you travel. I can adjust the amount of weight or resistance by the color of the bands . I use the bands to do a variety of exercises, in place of swinging my heavier iron. Great for building strength by doing more reps with less weight. I highly recommend this company, as well as, these bands.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Easy to switch between and very easy to use for physical therapy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for help doing my physical therapy at home during the time frame when I don't feel comfortable going out places. I wasn't sure at first the best way to use them until I opened the bag and found there was a strap that you shut in any indoor door frame that you can then put the bands through to use at any height needed. This is a big help for me to be able to do my exercises at home with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Green

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed to say the
customer_reviews.text: Have had these for a few months and 2 bands already snapped. They are not overused or abuse and kept inside not in the sun. Disappointed to say the least
customer_reviews.author: patriotgirl30

customer_reviews.title: High quality and durable bands
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying I bought bands from low quality bands from eBay during lockdown because everywhere else was sold out. Half the bands snapped in 2 months. When I received these black mountain bands it was night and day. Just the feel and quality are substantially better. Bands are attached to caribiners for a secure lock. Also come with ankle and door strap. Highly recommend for this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Helped with weight lifting routine
customer_reviews.text: I workout regularly and have always used dumbbells, but recently learned about the benefits of resistance bands. I saw the good reviews for this product and the many different resistances so gave it a try. Everything is included to easily use the bands anywhere. I will now use them with each muscle group to supplement my regular weight training. I use them for burnouts at the end and also injury prevention. This product is great for weightlifters and even can be the sole exercise for others. Black Mountain Products also has a promotion that agrees to give an additional resistance band with more tension to the customer. I will be sure to update if they actually do or not.
customer_reviews.author: Co

customer_reviews.title: For shorter than 5'7" frames
customer_reviews.text: Please check the return policy. These are very short bands that do not stretch much. I am 5'7" and can not use them or return them. I requested to return them as they have never been used, but was told I could not. Please review the length carefully before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: used it for a few weeks, start to tear ...
customer_reviews.text: used it for a few weeks, start to tear up, do not buy if you looking for a long term use
customer_reviews.author: xfourpower

customer_reviews.title: Don't Purachase
customer_reviews.text: Every single band has broken while working out with them. Major injury is just waiting to happen. Shocked that Amazon continues to sell these bands. Please do not purchase these bands for your and your loved one's safety.
customer_reviews.author: KKD

customer_reviews.title: Great versital product,Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Amazing versatility in adjusting your weight resistance. Bands are rated for different resistances and you can combine the light and heavy to achieve different maximum resistance. On arrival the package was missing the door anchor band. I contacted Amazon and they could only replace the complete set which involved repacking and returning the original shipment to Amazon. I contacted Black Mountain Products and they were able to replace the door anchor at no charge and give me the USPS tracking number at the same time. Amazing Customer Service. I would highly recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction and worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: The overall packaging and way this set is put together is pretty nice. The band's are solid and connections are very secure. The adjustability is very nice by just clipping bands together for different resistance combinations. The bag it comes in is very handy to keep all the parts together. I only wish the under-door anchor was a little wider. It slipped out but only on one door in the house. My wife has had much more success than I have with this. It is nice for an intense workout and can be used for a huge range of exercises. We will most likely be buying another set.
customer_reviews.author: Irem

customer_reviews.title: The cuff broke the first time I used it. ...
customer_reviews.text: The cuff broke the first time I used it. I don't have much faith that the other pieces won't break as well. Really dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: Llama Wizard

customer_reviews.title: Loved this product!
customer_reviews.text: I have used a lot of elastic bands and have purchased several sets in the past. I love this set. It is all that you need to work out with bands: the bag to store them, the set of elastic bands, the door anchor, the handles, ankle straps, and instructions. I am very pleased with my purchase. I am not sure how long bands last. But I will update this review in 6-12 months to talk about durability.
customer_reviews.author: Lubumba

customer_reviews.title: Love These
customer_reviews.text: Love these bands. Toning and working legs for the first time in many years. I use a simple weight bench which I place against the door jamb and stack the bands totaling a fair amount of resistance. I can then do forward and reverse leg curls. Legs feel great. I get a very good range of motion from these bands. Would definitely buy again and will soon be purchasing additional bands to add resistance to my workouts. Have added cable/band routine to now workout and isolate the outside pectoral muscle (flys), abdominal crunches and twists for the oblique muscle. Research weight cable machine workouts and most can be adapted for band workouts. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Animal lover

customer_reviews.title: Great for home or office workouts!
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of computer work for my occupation, and it has been vital for me to take breaks and either stretch out or get exercise. This purchase, along with an exercise ball and a yoga mat, have been absolutely essential for me to maintain my flexibility, strength, and overall health. These resistance bands are key for convenient strength exercises. They seem to be built with high quality standards. And the door anchor works great to add new dimensions to the exercises. Highly recommend bringing this set into your home or office, or both.
customer_reviews.author: danger.zone.ocelot

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and price !
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality n price. Then only 1 ankle strap ? I expected 2, so I could hook my own elastic bands around my legs ! Please see 2 ankle straps. And how can I buy 1 more ankle strap ? How much would it be ?
customer_reviews.author: Holy basil

customer_reviews.title: Not safe.
customer_reviews.text: Not safe. Please take a closer look of material of the loop. Not strong. The loop is broken and hit my neck horrible. It hurts. Dangerous. I stopped using it after apprx 18 months.
customer_reviews.author: Win Tchiong

customer_reviews.title: perfect for at home physical therapy exercises.
customer_reviews.text: Bands are perfect for my physical therapy back exercises. I would consider these more therapeutic than for serious muscle building. Bands are holding up well after a few months. Door anchor is easily put up and taken down (see pictures for how it works). All in all exactly what I was looking for to do my therapy exercises at home.
customer_reviews.author: C. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product. Unbelievable customer service
customer_reviews.text: I've been using BMP resistance bands for years and find that the bands are great quality, the attachments to the handles work well, and the handles and door mount round out a great package. What amazed me is their level of customer service: when I had a problem with one of the bands, they immediately shipped out a replacement. I can not speak more highly of this product / company.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Samuels

customer_reviews.title: Best Workout in a Bag
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this product because I wanted to start exercising and didn't want to buy a weight set. I really like this set of resistance bands because they are very versatile and easy to change the amount of resistance you want. The handles are padded and offer a lot of comfort. Not only can you use the bands singularly but you can also add as many bands as you want to increase the resistance. It also comes with at door anchor so you can do pulling exercises and an ankle strap so you can do leg exercises. Comes with a carry bag so you can take your workout with you. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Clinz

customer_reviews.title: Good bands, convenient carry bag
customer_reviews.text: Been using these a few weeks now and they seem solid. The door anchor is really slim, which makes it easy to move around, but still holds tight and doesn't move on its own. The only complaint I have is that this kit comes with only one ankle strap. Two would be ideal for any exercises that require a neutral grip with vertical movement - think hammer curls. I want better control than just gripping the band, but the handles are uncomfortable. Ankle strap is perfect. I bought a matching one for just a few bucks, but it would have been nice if two were included.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac G.

customer_reviews.title: Questionable durability?
customer_reviews.text: Loved the product until today. I'm 6 foot tall and 195 pounds. This was going to be an experiment for a weight loss schedule. I've been using them for 1 or 2 weeks. It's been great learning a new way to work out. However, the heavy strap (red-20 to 30 pounds) broke. Specifically, the webbing for the strap. This happened while doing butterflies and anchoring the strap to a door with the door jam strap. There's a picture of this above. It wasn't too comfortable when the strap grazed my arm. No injury worth going to a doctor for though. For an experiment around 20$, maybe worth it. I'll be upgrading to a hopefully higher quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: Better than weights
customer_reviews.text: I just pulled these out for my first work out with them. These are so much better than free weights: 1. I love that you can use more than one at once to really customize the resistance. Both my husband and I can use these and get the right work out. He could double, triple, quadruple up for more challenge. 2. Free weights are for arms, these can be used for arms and legs. 3. The cost of the variety of weights this can equal would be way more than these. 4. And take up way more space. 5. Movements feel more gentle and fluid, while still feeling the exercise. (Like swimming compared to running.)
customer_reviews.author: Jessican

customer_reviews.title: Total gym in a tiny bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a total gym in one bag. Leg day, arm day, abs day, mix it up every day. Great for circuit training for impact cardio. I put it on my door since it comes with an extra wrap that your able to put in the doorjam and close the door. This way I can do better work outs and don't need a partner. I don't have much room in my tiny apartment so this is perfect. Plus it stores away in a tiny zip up bag. Perfect. I highly recommend this for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Ddanielle

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy and Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great Set of Resistance Bands. I did my homework on various bands, and these bands are, bar none, the very best. My initial concerns, before my purchase, was durability. With reports of unfortunate accidents from a band snapping and causing injury, I wanted to reduce that occurrence by looking for quality over price. In my opinion, the construction of the bands is great. The interchangeable handle set is comfortable and the door frame anchor works well. Beyond the bands, customer service is unbelievable. This company takes pride in its product and, most importantly, customer satisfaction. I highly recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy's Closet

customer_reviews.title: Quick, Easy, and Reasonably Priced!
customer_reviews.text: The product is a nice quality. They can stretch quite a bit and they don't make me feel nervous that they'll snap or come undone somehow. While unnecessary for me, I appreciate the booklet that comes with many different exercises along with pictures and explanations. Also, the bag to put it all in is super helpful. Would definitely recommend for those who have issues coming up with excuses to go to the gym!
customer_reviews.author: Jett

customer_reviews.title: Use Properly.  Follow Directions. Door Specs May Vary.
customer_reviews.text: These bands work at least as well as I expected. Regarding the door gadget: Just close it in the door and run the bands through the loop to make a pull down exercise. Nice. I think the bands will last longer than my door frame. Follow the directions and make sure the door gap is small enough that the gadget will not slip through. Bands seem well made. I'm not concerned with them coming apart. They have inserts secured in the ends to keep them connected to the clips that allow quick attachment to the handles. I haven't used the ankle strap. But it seems well made also.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: rotator cuff - good! next up, knees!
customer_reviews.text: Everything arrived as expected. the pieces seem to be well made. I have been using this product for a couple of weeks now as a part of a daily routine to strengthen my rotator cuff. These resistance bands have worked very well. It is simple to configure between the bands and handles, and there is an overall 'solid' feel to the products. now that i have seen progress using these for my shoulders, i am looking into expanding my daily routine to include exercises to help my knees. i am not sure which part of me is going to break next, but i hope it can be helped by these bands! : )
customer_reviews.author: bill

customer_reviews.title: The best thing to happen to my workouts...
customer_reviews.text: I started a Keto diet and lost a significant amount of weight, but kept putting off resistance training because I wasn’t ready to join a gym. I only have my BANDS a few days but I already feel like they have changed my life. I take them with me, everywhere!!! I can do a quick set of curls, triceps and chest on my lunch break. I already know they will take me to the next level... They are lightweight and convenient, but don’t be fooled... I already got the blood pumping with one set. I can’t wait to see results after using them consistently for a longer period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Yo itz Vinny

customer_reviews.title: Black band snapped at handle in less than 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: The black band broke not even two weeks after I had it. It didn’t snap where bands usually do this one broke off right by the handle. These bands were different then the prior ones I owned from the same manufacturer those lasted a long as I would except. These new ones don’t seem to be made as well.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony J. Hehn

customer_reviews.title: These work great
customer_reviews.text: The biggest challenge with bands like this is trying to convert familiar exercises and workouts to make them usable for the results you may seek. Aside from that, these are easy to use, very versatile, and portable enough to keep in your backpack or in the truck of your car to get a workout in anywhere anytime. Great value in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: Montray D Solomon

customer_reviews.title: Shocked at how well this worked
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a way to keep up with my fitness when traveling or stuck in the office. I have used this product for several months now and have been completely satisfied. I did not realize how much I would be able to accomplish and how effective it would be. Exceeded my expectations in all regards. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Paul S.

customer_reviews.title: Snapped on me**updated—good customer service
customer_reviews.text: I have only had these for a few Months. I have only used them a handful of times and the blue one snapped on me this morning during my workout. Seems like they should last longer than that especially since I’ve barely used them. Update: I contacted the company directly because my return window through amazon had closed. I told them my blue band had snapped after not very many uses. They immediately sent me a brand new blue band! Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: KMK

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of basic resistance bands, fast shipping, great packaging
customer_reviews.text: Nice set of starting resistance bands, good variety of 'resistances' - well-constructed and sturdy. The package arrived quickly, and nicely packaged. :-) Everything fits in the zippered pouch. The only comment I would have is that the photos in the user's guide could be a little larger and clearer (better contrast). I'm not familiar with the resistance band exercises, so it would be very helpful to see the photos more clearly, and for each exercise to list the muscles worked. I had to ask my personal trainer about the right technique to use because I couldn't always tell from photos. However, I am very pleased with the resistance bands, I did the "lateral walk" and it definitely worked my glutes!
customer_reviews.author: Patti JF

customer_reviews.title: Great set of bands.....great price, too! 👍🏽
customer_reviews.text: These bands are just what the doctor ordered! They are easy to use with clear instructions provided. The exercises provide a thorough and safe workout for beginners using resistance bands. The bands, handgrips, spring clips, and door anchors are well-made from high quality materials. The entire kit fits neatly in a zippered nylon bag which doesn’t take up any space - far easier than a loose set of free weights, and also safer to use. I especially like that the company is family owned and operated, and my phone call was answered promptly by one of the family members, not a local from a foreign country speaking English poorly!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Olivia Tibbs

customer_reviews.title: Overall great addition to my workout equipment
customer_reviews.text: This has been great so far. The little piece that's meant to be used with a closed door is brilliant. The bands appear to be made from good material. I've been using it now that I'm without a gym due to COVID. It's not meant to be a total replacement, just something minimal that gets the job done and it does just that.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R

customer_reviews.title: Super Fab Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a tremendous product. It allows me to exercise muscles I can't with free weights or just gravity. I have less fatigue/joint stress with Black Mountain Products than with free weights. And, since I rotate days using free weights/gravity-only exercises with days I use Black Mountain bands, it allows me to implement "muscle confusion" and work out more often. I'm more fit than ever. Thanks, Black Mountain!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great set of hands!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these for a couple of weeks and they're surprisingly sturdy. The door anchor is super easy to use and makes switching exercises easy. I know others like me are probably looking for the best possible exercise bands during covid but they're all sold out. I was hesitant to buy this but it is great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like it except for what just happened to me
customer_reviews.text: Ok product for its price. I like it except for what just happened to me. Have to say one thing about the quality/safety issue of using it: near the end of the rubber band where the ball holds it with the handle is not a good design. The extension of the rubber material probably shortens the life of the band as we exercise. Like some other customers have reported, mine broke at this spot as well while I was doing overhead tricep extension. Yes, the band whipped on my right ear and right side of my back. Not fun experience, deciding to use gym more often than this kind of products...
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I like the product - great value for the money. It works well. Most important - after a few weeks of semi-daily use, one of the handles broke. The plastic cylinder within one of the handles broke in half. I emailed the manufacturer. It promptly shipped to me TWO new handles without any fuss and without charging shipping. Hooray!
customer_reviews.author: John B. Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile!
customer_reviews.text: I initially purchased these resistance bands to help strengthen my rotator cuffs and accessory muscles in my shoulders and that’s it. After receiving the product and reviewing the guide with all the possible exercises and using them once, they became a staple in my overall routine. These work really well for isolating muscles and can be used in any way that a cable machine at a gym can be used. Overall I am very impressed by the product in terms of versatility and the bands build quality.
customer_reviews.author: Maximiliano Espinosa

customer_reviews.title: Great bands -- higher quality than many sold on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I have used BMP bands for years and have been very pleased with the quality -- much better than other bands I ordered in error. It is important to watch the bands for signs of deterioration over time because they do eventually wear out. However, the BMP bands have worked well for me and I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: CJMinDC

customer_reviews.title: Black Mountain almost killed me
customer_reviews.text: The strap's jam slipped through the door frame hitting me in the head so hard I passed out. Family wants me to go to the ER. I followed the directions exactly. I will never use these again.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin S

customer_reviews.title: I'm so pleased with the service of this company!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the bands for more than 7 years. They have been easy to change and offer a great variety of resistances that can be made. I recognize that, as a user, I need to be alert to parts becoming unsafe after extensive use. This company, however, is ready to replace parts without questions when you request a replacement. When I have had a question about the safety of any part of the set, the company has sent me a replacement free of charge. For this reason I feel completely safe using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for therapy and low to moderate workouts
customer_reviews.text: The set includes bands of 6 different strengths. The weakest strength is perfect for therapy for someone who is dealing with a tear in the biceps tendon in the rotator cuff area (the reason I bought the set). The weakest band, however, is too weak to be of much use for a male that is uninjured and physically fit. The bands step up in strength gradually so that the strongest (red) band can really give you a work out. The soft grip handles are well constructed, comfortable and can easily be clipped and unclipped from the bands. The door anchor works fine as well. All the parts are solidly constructed.
customer_reviews.author: R. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, EVEN GREATER customer service,Life time Guarantee. FREE replacements on the ones I used until they gave out.
customer_reviews.text: Black Mountain Products makes the best Resistance Bands around. They also have the best life time guarantee, and awesome customer service. I've been using the bands, and over time the years the bands are starting to get worn and splitting, and one email to Black Mountain and they sent me FREE of charge, FREE shipping, replacements on the blue, yellow, and green bands that I use the most. THEY ARE AWESOME FOLKS at BLACK MOUNTAIN!!! You can't go wrong, and they are always there!!!
customer_reviews.author: Deb KayeTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: They stand by their warranty!
customer_reviews.text: 5 years later, 1 band separated from the handle and another began to have wear and tear. Contacted company. New bands are in the mail! No questions asked. Wow. I'm impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Top Notch
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to purchase resistance bands because they didn't seem dynamic and heavy duty enough for what I thought I needed in a home workout. I was really wanting a weight/dumbbell set because that's what I'm used to. However, for the price of the bands, and their apparent simplicity, I bought a set. I've had them for a month and I absolutely love them! For one, they don't take up any space to use and store (obviously) and are more dynamic and heavy duty that I realized, especially when using the included anchor strap. This is a quality product, and I like the workout instructions that come with it which have helped to jump-start my regimen. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: ZGILL

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars for price, quality, and value.
customer_reviews.text: I only give 5 stars for products that deserve it. You get more than you pay for with this band system.I found this product searching for Crossover Symmetry bands. While they are not the same quality of Symmetry bands, they are only a fraction of the cost. You would need a second set of bands to perform crossover exercises, but that still is a way better value than the expensive Crossover Symmetry bands. I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Alan S. Johnson Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant Surprise
customer_reviews.text: Just received my resistance bands a few days ago, and must say I'm pretty impressed. I like must buyers read the product reviews before making my purchase, and after reading one particular review where the bracket snapped in half and cut the persons foot I must admit I had my concerns. So I "rolled the dice" anyway based on price/value and the overwhelming positive reviews. As soon as my package came I opened it expecting to find those poor quality brackets but was shocked to find something else. It actually shipped with some nice decent quality carabiners instead of the snap on brackets. It reassured me that BMP cares about their products and pays attention to their reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Eshoo

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely No Way You Could Be Disappointed in This Product - IT ROCKS!!
customer_reviews.text: This resistance band set is AWESOME. Super happy with the purchase. Very well made and easy to change out bands. The accompanying black bag is great to throw everything in to and keep together and for traveling. Definitely a great easy pack-along for work trips. If you stay at a hotel or somewhere with a less than desirable exercise facility or it's crowded. This allows for a great workout in your room. May buy a second set to keep at work for short workouts throughout the day in my cubicle. Definitely recommend this product. The high reviews speak for themselves.
customer_reviews.author: SWsam

customer_reviews.title: Held up for almost 4 years.
customer_reviews.text: I first purchased in June of 2016. As of February 2020 I'm seeing the first signs of tearing in one of the bands. Everything else has held up great. These are high quality and very useful. Apparently they had a rough patch when it came to stitching, but it seems to have since been fixed.
customer_reviews.author: David

product_meta.title: Black Mountain Products Resistance Band Set with Door Anchor, Ankle Strap, Exercise Chart, and Carrying Case
product_meta.description: Black Mountain Products (B.M.P.) resistance bands are made from the highest quality rubber to ensure maximum life. This set of resistance bands includes five stackable resistance bands, two handles, door anchor, carrying bag, and exercise manual. This set of exercise bands optimizes the advantage of using any single or multiple (1-5) bands at once to achieve multiple levels of resistance. B.M.P.'s stackable set of exercise bands allow for a much wider range of resistance, (4lbs to 75lbs) then traditional resistance bands sets. Any combination of bands may be used at one time, without the hassles of having multiple handles on each band. This increase in range and ease of use makes this set perfect for anyone from beginners and experts. Stackable bands allow you to achieve the highest levels of resistance possible.
feature_bullets: Bands included: Yellow (2-4 lbs.), blue (4-6 lbs.), green (10-12 lbs.), black (15-20 lbs.) and Red (25-30 lbs.). All bands are 48 inches in length
This stackable set of resistance bands can produce up to 75 lbs
Features a metal clipping System on bands for attachment to soft-grip handles or ankle straps
Includes a door anchor, exercise chart, carrying bag, ankle strap and starter guide
All Black Mountain Products come with a manufacturer's Lifetime Warranty

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
